It isn't the kind that folds up, but that is pretty neat.=A0 I read the oth=
er e-mails about your bow. I am a superstitious man, and I believe in the o=
ld legends about things such as muramasa blades and the like, so I advise t=
hat you leave it be.=A0 Things like that always turn out to be malevolent, =
and as nice of a bow it may be, it has something bad seeming about it.=A0 B=
ut, afterall, I am superstitious. Just call it a hunch.
